LanguageData.TableArcaneForge.label: 奥术熔炉
LanguageData.TableArcaneForge.description: 只有法师才能使用的奥术熔炉，在奥术熔炉上可以消耗法力来锻造魔法物品。锻造出来的物品质量由法师的智识技能和法师的等级来决定。
LanguageData.TableArcaneForge_Blueprint.label: arcane forge (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableArcaneForge_Blueprint_Install.label: arcane forge (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableArcaneForge_Frame.label: arcane forge (building)
LanguageData.TableArcaneForge_Frame.description:
The arcane forge allows a mage to wield raw arcane power to create material objects.
Scientifically, the arcane forge might be described as a matter fabricator, though the exact mechanics have yet to be determined. Only those possessing the ability to manipulate arcane power are able to use the arcane forge.
Using the arcane forge dramatically increases crafting speed but consumes mana. Items of quality are determined by the mage's intelligence skill and class level.
LanguageData.TableMagicCircle.label: 魔法阵
LanguageData.TableMagicCircle.description:
魔法阵是一个建筑，通过将物理和奥术融合在一起来增强魔法。虽然看起来很简单，但魔法阵的轮廓是用精致的符文勾勒出来的，并且构造得非常精确。法师可以使用魔法阵来增强他们的力量，或者将他们的能量与其他法师结合来创造独特的，强大的效果。这个魔法阵最多可以容纳六个法师。建筑材料的种类直接影响着魔法阵的质量。
 石头（任何）：没有增强
 钢铁：没有增强
 木：没有增强
 翡翠：成功几率+20%
 白银：退还材料费的20%
 玻璃钢：增强+15%
 金子：事件增强+10%，持续时间+20%
 铀：持续时间和成功率+15%
 魔法合金：成功几率+15%，返还25%法力消耗*管理提示：当魔法阵检测到法师能够执行仪式时，它将自己补充燃料。
LanguageData.TableMagicCircle_Blueprint.label: magic circle (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableMagicCircle_Frame.label: magic circle (building)
LanguageData.TableMagicCircle_Frame.description:
The magic circle is a construct that amplifies magic by aligning the physical and arcane into a focal point. While it may seem simple, the circle is outlined with elaborate runes and constructed with detailed precision.
Mages can use the magic circle to augment their power or combine their energy with other mages to create unique, powerful effects. The circle may accomodate up to six mages.
The type of material used in construction directly affects the quality of the magic circle. Stone (any): no bonuses Steel: no bonus Wood: no bonus Jade: success chance +30% Silver: refunds 25% of material cost Plasteel: event points +15%, duration +10% Gold: event points +20%, duration +20%, refunds 15% of material cost Uranium: duration and success chance +20% Arcalleum: success chance +15%, refunds 25% of mana cost
*Admin note: the circle will fuel itself when it detects mages capable of performing the ritual.
LanguageData.TableSmallMagicCircle.label: 魔法中心
LanguageData.TableSmallMagicCircle.description:
魔法中心是研究魔法雷电和神秘联系产生的副产品。魔法中心能让法师可视化他们与盖亚和其他法师的联系，允许他们与自然、秩序和混乱进行“互动”。魔法中心可以连接两个法师的魔法力量来执行强大的仪式。建筑材料的种类直接影响着魔法中心的质量
 石头（任意）：无 
 钢铁：无 
 木：无 
 翡翠：成功几率+15% 
 白银：返还材料的15% 
 玻璃钢：事件增强+15% 
 金子：事件增强+10%，持续时间+15%，返还材料的10% 
 铀：持续时间和成功几率+10% 
 魔法合金：成功几率+10%，退还10%的法力消耗
 *管理提示：当魔法阵检测到法师能够执行仪式时，它将自己补充燃料。法师不能被迫在魔法中心工作，但会在条件满足时执行仪式。
LanguageData.TableSmallMagicCircle_Blueprint.label: magic focal point (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableSmallMagicCircle_Frame.label: magic focal point (building)
LanguageData.TableSmallMagicCircle_Frame.description:
Arcane focal points are the byproduct of research into magical ley lines and arcane interconnectivity. The focal point allows a mage to visualize their connection to gaia and other other mages, allowing them greater interaction with nature, order, and chaos. The focal point can link the arcane power of two mages to perform powerful rituals.
The type of material used in construction directly affects the quality of the magic circle. Stone (any): no bonuses Steel: no bonus Wood: no bonus Jade: success chance +15% Silver: refunds 15% of material cost Plasteel: event points +15% Gold: event points +10%, duration +15%, refunds 10% of material cost Uranium: duration and success chance +10% Arcalleum: success chance +10%, refunds 10% of mana cost
*Admin note: the circle will fuel itself when it detects mages capable of performing the ritual. Mages can not be forced to work at the focal point, but will perform rituals when conditions are met.
